original_text: And he returned to him, and behold, he and all the princes of Moab were standing beside his burnt offering.
korean_text: 그가 발락에게로 돌아간즉 발락과 모압의 모든 고관이 번제물 곁에 함께 섰더라

sentences.original_text: he and all the princes of Moab were standing beside his burnt offering
sentences.korean_translation: 그와 모압의 모든 방백이 그의 번제물 곁에 서 있었다
